text: No the only part that I'm still figuring out is that style setting tag, but the rendering around the dnd_areas and required header tags will stay as it is now. Important to note that the dnd_area needs to be named `"main"` and there can only be one. There also restrictions on nesting which is not present in pages, but we have validation against all that.

There are also tag attributes that will be different between pages and email. For example the section tag in this example doesn't support `max_width` or `vertical_alignment`. There will be docs when this is actually released.
